11.title: Rebecca

choices: Giving her lots of fatty snacks (minifridge in room, chips in pantry, etc.)
111211.content:
As Rebecca's mom Tara looked at the package in the mail, she new she wouldn't be happy. Going up to her room and locking the door so no one would see her reaction, she steeled herself to open it. What was this ominous package? A foreclosure notice? A huge overdue bill? No, money was fine at the Clark household. Inside the package were Rebecca's grades.
"OK, I've prepared myself for the worst, how bad could it be?" Tara thought out loud.
Slowly, she pulled the sheet of doom out of the envelope, reading it as it came out.

--To the parent(s)/gaurdian(s) of REBECCA CLARK
Your childs grades in each subject are as follows:

World History----------- D-
French--------------------- F
Language Arts---------- F
Home Ec.---------------- D+
Algebra-------------------- F
Genetic Sciences----- D-
Health--------------------- D
Computer Sciences-- F

Overall GPA: 0.5
(Please sign below to acknowledge you are aware of this child's Final Grades)
____________________________________

"Oh. My. ****ing ****! Point Five!" Exclaimed Tara. "I don't even know what to do about this, what could have caused this?!?!?!?!?!?!?!? I knew she wasn't near Honor Roll, but this is abismal! OK, calm down Tara. Lets just go through the possibilities. First of Facebook. I never shouold have let her get an account, so I can at least remove that right away. Cell phone too, I don't know what possessed me to buy her one with an unlimited texting contract. What else? Those don't help grades, but they can't be solely responsible for this monstrosity! Think, Tara, think! Oh no, of course! Cheerleading! She spends three hours or more a day at practice. That's all time she could be studying! And Darren, too! She spends a minimum two hours a day talking to or going on dates with him!"

Then she saw another sheet in the envelope. It was the results of a survey each student had to fill out. Most of it was generic survey crap, but one thing was special.
(Tara's thoughts)


"What are the three most important things in your life?"

----My family(at least there's one positive in this), my friends(No Facebook, no cell phone, that's taken care of), and my body!


"Oh my gosh, I know how to punish her. If the thing she values most is her body, then I have to take that away from her. Wait, I'm her mom, I couldn't do that! Could I?" Wondered Tara. One more glance at Rebecca's grades gave her the answer she needed. She would do anything for her daughter's future, and if she didn't have a good figure, Darren would dump her, and she couldn't go out for cheerleading in High School. Yes, she decided, this is the best solution. The only question is, how?
111211.title: Failing/bad grades

11121111.content:
"I brought your aunt here from Mexico for the summer! She's making some food for you, and she'll be taking care of your diet from now on."
"But she always thinks I'm too thin! She always feeds me too much!"
"Don't worry, you'll be fine"
Rebecca walked towards the dinner table.
What she saw was a huge spread of beans, rice, tortillas, burritos, and chicken.
Rebecca sat down, and her aunt came out
" Becca! You're so skinny! it's good I made plenty for you. Go on, dig in!"

Rebecca dug in. Thirty minutes passed, then an hour, then two.
In the end, Rebecca gained ten pounds and her pants wouldn't fit.

She ran upstairs and put on some sweatpants. "This is going to be a long summer"

111211112.content:
Rebecca wakes up on a Friday morning to the smell of Mexican food.
She rolls out of bed. Since her Aunt came to her house, she had gained 100 pounds. Her thighs had gotten much thicker, and her ass was much bigger, in addition to her bigger belly and tubby arms. Her face was also chubbed up with a generous double-chin She was now big and fat.

She slipped on her black gym shorts (that were far-stretched), sandles, and a yellow shirt her mother wore when she was chubby. It was so tight is showed the outline of her bellybutton and didn't cover her belly all the way.

She ran down-stairs to another big meal. Five churros, four tacos, a plate of rice, and a chocolate milk-shake."Make sure to eat up, I still want you nice and big and healthy.
Rebecca eats the whole meal, but hears a ripping sound when she gets up to wash her dishes.

She looks at her shorts, and sees a rip down the side.

"Aunt, can we go to the store and get some new clothes?"
111211112.title: Two weeks...

1112111122.content:
Two more weeks passed, and Rebecca was finally as big as her Aunt wanted, 350 pounds.
Rebecca put on some shorts that could stretch far enough to fit over all of her fat that showcased her pillowy calves and huge thighs. She had a red t-shirt that was just big enough to fit snuggly over her hanging belly and massive chest. All that and a pair of sandles that she couldn't see when standing up.

She waddled downstairs to see her smiling Aunt. "My little girl isn't skinny anymore! I'm happy I could get you to a healthy weight."
"Yeah, it feels good to be nice and big. Thanks a lot!"
"I have big news for you. Your mother told me about your grades, and you're moving back with me in Mexico."
"What????"
"It's ok! I never had good grades either. You're coming down there with me to work on my farm."

11121112.content:
A storm of chefs with tables of Italian food comes through the door. "Ok dear, this is what we're going to do. It's a new style of fine dining. You just lay in bed, don't move a finger, and these people feed you!" "Errr, mom, I have to do my homework." "Oh, don't you worry about that! You're now being home schooled from now on." "What!?" "That's right honey. You don't have to worry about how your friends see you or grades or school work or anything! You just stay home, lie in bed, watch TV, and eat. I got personal tutors to take care of ALL your work" "But mom I-" "You what? Are you trying to say that you'd much rather go to school and work hard rather than watch tv, sleep, and eat?"

The girl thought about what her life would be like. No school? No work? Just sleeping and eating? This sounded great to her.
"Alright mom, I'm ready."
She then went up to her room and laid in her bed. The chefs came in with trays and tables of food.
First came three subs, two full plates of spaghetti and meatballs, and four plates of ravioli. She washed it all down with some soda, a liter to be exact. At this point, she was stuffed. Her pants were unzipped and unbuttoned, and her stomach was sticking out of her shirt. Her arms were by her side as she let out a massive belch. "Uhg, exuse me" she said, embarrassed over belching. "Oh no dear, don't say sorry. You're my little piggy. Don't worry about belching. It's alright. Now, you need to keep eating. There is plenty of food here and you need to eat it so you can move on to desert."

The girl was devastated. She was already about to burst from what she just ate! But before she could speak up, a chef shoved food into her mouth. Chicken Parmesan cutlet, pasta, and veil. She decided not to resist and closed her eyes. She got comfy and enjoyed the flavors of the food in her mouth. After about five minutes of constant stuffing, no more food was getting fed to her. "Good job honey, you gobbled up all the food these chefs made for you." She looked down at her stomach and it was seriously bloated. With her head back, she couldn't see her feet, her over bloated stomach was in the way. A button on her shirt had popped, it looked way too small for her.
"I'll let you take a break dear. You can rest now. When you wake up, we'll cook you up the best breakfast you've ever had, and you can have the desert you didn't have tonight for second breakfast." "Second breakfast?" "Yes dear, from now on, you'll have six meals a day, and all the snacks you want."

The whole crowd of chefs left and so did her mother. The girl turned on her tv, and then went to the bathroom. She stepped on the scale. It read 160. She went to bed with the thought "I can't believe it. I went from thin to average in one sitting."
11121112.title: "Oh, just a feast of italian food."

Tara would often keep an eye on her daughter to see if the effects were settling in but for a while nothing happened, Rebecca would just eat a piece of cake or two, watch some TV, and then sleep on her comfy couch. Tara was disappointed to say the least. True this plan wasn't a complete financial loss I mean, she still had loads of money, but it seemed that her weight gain plan was just not gonna happen. As she sat on the living room couch and watched another episode of Matlock to honor the memory of Andy Griffith, Rebecca then came out because she needed to go to the bathroom (this was an exception on the "house arrest" rule). When Tara grunted for the 5th time of the day she then noticed something incredible! At first she thought her eyes were tricking her and so he ran to Rebecca before she could enter the bathroom to get a closer look.

"Um, mom?" Rebeccas said in confusion as she watched her mother inspect her clothes. Granted, it was normal for Tara to inspect a new outfit to see if it was "Appropriate" but the thing was, these weren't new. Rebecca then got even more confused as she saw her mother cry tears of joy.

Tara just cried happy tears as she looked at the tags of her daughter's clothes which was very crudely sew on. That was when Tara realized that:

"It worked," she said between crying, "IT WORKED!"

Rebecca was getting a bit creeped out at this point as she patted her mother's head and said "Good for you" in a ridiculously happy tone. She then pried Tara off her and closed the bathroom door in order to do her business privately. Tara then walked back to the couch and laughed evilly.

"Yes," she said with a psychotic grin, "she's changing! Boy am I glad I was able to catch that, or else I would've gone for the more direct approach, mainly gassing her and stuffing her through a funnel while she was in a coma."

After that...awkward unveiling of an alternate, Tara the paced the kitchen wondering what to do next. Should she just let thing's play out normally? Or should she intervene a little? Tara at first was going to just take the former option but then she looked at her phone and remembered a friend. A certain male fried who revealed to her a month ago that he was making a weight gaining serum! I mean granted, that moment of recognition was a bit random but now Tara had another idea to choose. But in the end, she had a decision.

One of them had to be picked.

Tara swam through her contacts list and immediately found her friend! After pressing the buttons and waiting for him to pick up, Tara was greeted with a slimy voice.

"Ah," the voice said, "If it isn't my old pal Tara! How goes it?"

"Fine, Dr Nick" Tara said, "Listen, have you finished that weight gaining serum thing?"

"You mean my super-chubby-maker 2000? A project I started on two years ago? Hmm, I'm pretty sure I did during that time."

"Cut the crap!" She snapped with a snap that was supposed to be audible but ended up not, "I need it now!"

"Oh do you?" Dr. Nick asked with a sound that was supposed to be a slither but instead sounded like someone trying to literally say "Sigh". "Well, luckily I still have some in stock-"

"In stock?"

"Oh yes. You wouldn't believe how many chubby chasers there are in the world!"

"Look, just give me the freaking serum I need it right now!"

"Geez, don't be crabby Tara, I'm just explaining you know! Anyway, expect it to be at your door in about 5 hours."

"Wait, aren't I supposed to pay you something?"

"Oh no, no, no ! This one's on the house! Consider it a token of gratitude! Just be careful, the potion is made of real grease, lots of sugar, is filled with 4,000 calories per serving, and is incredibly addictive. to to mention the fact that it can...alter your mind so to speak. So you see, if I were you, I wouldn't use a whole lot of it and I'd make sure that I wouldn't eat anything that contains serum inside. Now then, if you don't mind, I have to make another call."

With a little click, Nick was gone and Tara was alone with that evil grin back on her face.

"Well now," she said, "My plan is going along nicely!"

As a couple more hours passed, a knock was made at the door. When Tara opened it, she found a box containing multiple bottles of the super-chubby-maker 200 along with a note that said, "USE WISELY!" on it. Tara quickly grabbed the box and headed inside her room to think. Now that she had the serum in her hands, Tara wondered whether to inject it all in everything now, or later.

Zap: Come on! Just once Zip! It could be better with this human girl bigger than anything with her oufit she's wearing.
Zip: You know what? I'm agree with you. But only just once remember!
Zap: Ok then! Here it goes!

Zap activates the laser gun as it aimed towards a sleepy Rebecca's belly and shoots it with green beam coming through. Although she was still sleeping, She'll never notice until she'll knew her change anytime soon. Soon after she was beamed, Both aliens started to fly off not far from her when they landed on the table where the resting chair is placed near to it and after few seconds later, she started to grew...

12.title: Mel J

121.content:
Well it's summer holiday's and 14 yad old Mel J is on her first day of her summer job which lasts until her schools back in next month. Before she finished school, her teacher had a concern that she had put on weight recently. Of cousre right now she weighs at 158lbs. So she made a decision to send Mel J for a summer job, something she was about to do when she leaves school.

'Uncle Sam's Food Tasting Factory'. It's a place where it is owned by Uncle Sam, which he is in fact Mel J's uncle and Mel J was delighted her teacher gave her something to work for the summer and that's why she's going to Uncle Sam's on her first day. She walked smiling as she enters a 2 door entrance where she saw the place which is huge with lot's of food she can try and maybe putting on more weight that's Mel J's opinion. She then went up to the reception and was spotted by his uncle with delight as he was told she was coming for work.

Uncle Sam: "Why look who's here? It's my favourite neice and I heared you came for work ain't it?"
Mel J: "Yes Uncle Sam! It's true when my teacher told me where to go so here I am."
Uncle Sam: "Oh yeah that teacher you have, she knew that you put on weight that's what I like to see this big girl getting fat and all that you doing."
Mel J: "Yeah, but how does she did she put me here because of my weight?"
Uncle Sam: "Truth is I told her you would love to work with my factory and make you stuff it all up."
Mel J: "And now I'm here for work, I'm on it Uncle Sam!"
Uncle Sam: "Great! But would you like me to...
121.title: Summer Job for Mel J

choices: Learn way around factory and get some food while she's at it
1212.content:
"Now, as long as you're here I expect you to work. After all, that's what you're here for. So I figure I could give you a tour of the factory," Uncle Sam was already making his way down a long hallway, gesturing for Mel to follow him as they proceeded past numerous doors.

"This area is where the offices are. If you ever need me, this is where I'll be, along with the rest of the management crew."

Mel glanced at the numerous closed doors, though most of them had name tags hanging on them indicating who they belonged to, "Where's your office?"

"Mine is on the second floor, just above the reception desk. If you ever get lost, just make your way to the receptionist and she can help you find me. Though, I'll ask you not to disturb the other managers since they're always busy. It takes a lot to run a factory this size. Especially when you're known internationally."

Uncle Sam pushed through a pair of double doors at the end of the hallway, stopping as he gestured at the large room around him, "I present to you, the factory! This is where you'll be working."

Mel stopped, mouth slightly agape at the massive room she found herself in. There were conveyor belts and machines everywhere, all filled with food. There were cookies and pastries and cakes and brownies and so many other types of desserts. There didn't seem to be too many workers, though the ones she saw definitely seemed like they were used to sampling the products.

"This is amazing." Mel J said, as her stomach let out a low growl of anticipation, "So what am I going to be doing?"

"Well, the truth is. I need a new food taster. Or as I like to call it, a quality assurance specialist. My last one isn't able to come to work anymore, and I need a new one. Now, I know that you're teacher wanted you to get this job because she was concerned about your weight, but it was the only opening that I had available. Though honestly, you're just skin and bones anyway and maybe gaining a few more pounds would be good for you." Sam placed his arm around Mel's shoulder guiding her towards one of the conveyor belts loaded with cookies, "All you have to do is try the food at random and let me know if anything isn't up to par."

Mel took one of the cookies that he offered her, before shoving it into her mouth. It was so rich and delicious, and she instinctively reached for another cookie, then another, "I think I'm going to like this job."

Sam chuckled as he watched his niece shoving cookies into her mouth like a child in a candy store, "I'm sure you will, now maybe we should continue the rest of the tour."

Mel nodded, grabbing a couple more cookies as she followed him deeper into the factory, "So what exactly will I be doing?"

"As I said, you'll be tasting the food at random to make sure it tastes just as good as Grandma used to make. Now, I don't want you to fill up on just one thing, you need to test at least a couple things from each batch. I'll make sure you have a list of the mandatory items that you'll have to test each day." Sam said, raising his voice as you neared a rather noisy machine.

"I think my teacher sent me to the wrong job if she was worried about me gaining weight."

"Maybe, that just depends on how much you sample. Obviously you could gain weight very quickly if you aren't careful."

"So what happened to the last taster?"

"She grew a little too big for this job." Sam said, waving his hand dismissively, "Don't worry, she's being well take care of though in her retirement."

The tour lasted almost an hour as Mel was led around to where all the different foods were made, and she was introduced to some of the other workers. She was surprised to discover that Sam lived in the factory, and even had a large bedroom for her that overlooked a large indoor swimming pool. They finished their tour in the massive cafeteria for the workers where free meals were served throughout the day.

"So, that concludes our tour, was there anything else that you needed to ask me about? If not, I think it's time for me to get back to work. You're free to have the rest of the day to do whatever you want, though tomorrow your shift will be from nine to five, so make sure you're ready. I'll have Helen, the receptionist, help you get started tomorrow with all the paperwork and instructions you'll need."

Mel glanced around the cafeteria as her stomach let out a loud growl, "I don't think there's anything else that I needed right now. Thanks Sam!"

"No problem, anything for my favorite niece. Now maybe you should go get that rumbling tummy taken care of ."

Mel watched as Sam left back onto the factory floor, the double swinging doors quickly blocking him from view. She licked her lips and made her way towards the serving line, where some rather obese women served her a large tray-ful of turkey dinner. Mel plopped down at one of the tables, quickly devouring her meal. She couldn't believe how good it tasted as she wiped the last little bit from her lips with a napkin.

She glanced down at her slightly chubby belly, rubbing it contentedly as she leaned back on the bench. Honestly, the nicest thing so far was being away from the rest of her family and teachers that all seemed so concerned about her gaining weight recently. So what? It wasn't like she was that fat. Honestly, all their complaining about her weight just made her want to gain weight just to spite them.

Mel smiled as she looked at the empty tray. Maybe she should gain weight. It was her teacher's idea to get a job, though they didn't do a good job of choosing where to send her if they were worried about her weight. Besides, she'd always been interested to know what it would be like to actually be fat, and not just a little chubby.

She nodded to herself as she made her decision. She was going to do the job that Sam had given her, and maybe try to put on some weight in the process. Though she didn't think that would be very hard with all the free food that was being offered to her. She had always had a weak spot for food, and had trouble controlling her impulses. Thus why she was a little on the chubby side. Though now she was going to give in fully to her desires.

Though, from what everyone else looked like around the factory, it seemed she wasn't the only one with a weak will. She didn't think she'd seen anyone that wasn't at least chubby inside the factory. Even Sam was on the heavier side. Still, she had to do her job as well or she was sure that Sam would be mad.

Now the big question was what to do with the rest of her day. She could see about trying to remember where all the different foods were in the factory so she could do her job better, and maybe sample some goodies along the way. She could also go lounge in the pool. She had just bought a new bikini and she wanted to try it on. Though, that might be counterproductive towards gaining weight, but it looked like they had poolside service if she wanted to just lounge and eat. The other option was to see how much of the delicious food she could get from the cafeteria.
1212.title: A Grand Beginning

choices: Mel J heads to the swimming pool
Mel J heads to the lounge chair
Mel J heads to the food bar by the pool
12122.content:
Now that she’s got until tomorrow to start her first shift, Mel J had to wonder what to do during her rest day? There are some number of options being available, though the smell of that food makes her wanna get hungry again, no matter where that’s coming from. But regardless of this, she’ll be hoping to get loads of food there, when she decides where to go.

“Hmm... I think heading to the lounge by the pool sounds like a nice way to settle myself down, that’s for sure!” Mel J says, when made a decision to spend her rest day in all.

And so with that decision, it was time for Mel J to head over to the lounge, and spotted a changing rooms to get into her one-piece swimsuit. She went in and tries to put it on as much as she can, which she felt it a bit tight, despite she bought this new. She felt her swimsuit sticks onto her chubby body, making it sticking it, including her butt that looked like it had gotten bigger.

Mel J may be blushed from this, but she didn’t want to complain and basically wanted to enjoy her rest day, as if there isn’t gonna he any, when she’s starts working for Uncle Sam the next day. It would take a couple of minutes for Mel J to come out of the changing rooms, when she looked around and see where would she like to start off first?

She looked around the area, where there’s a swimming pool she would like to have fun with it, but there’s also a lounge chair, so that she can have a chill for a bit. But also, there’s a good bar by the pool, so that she could come up and stuff herself to make her satisfied, whilst having some leisure time in the pool. Mel J had some thoughts to think, until she shrugged and headed over to where?
12122.title: Lounge by the pool

choices: Go binge at the cafeteria again
Wait until morning for more food
12123.content:
Despite how much she'd just eaten, Mel's mouth was still watering at the savory smell emanating from the serving line. She knew that one tray was probably enough food for two people, but it wasn't like there was anyone here to stop her if she wanted seconds. Usually her mother would chew her out if she went back for seconds, then point to her pudgy belly and complain that she was going to get fat, but here there was no one to stop her.

She quickly jumped to her feet and returned to the serving line. The large lady just smiled and plopped a massive portion of potatoes and gravy on her tray before the next lady threw several thick slices of turkey on top. Mel licked her lips as the next lady placed a couple rolls onto the tray. She rushed back to her spot and began shoveling the food into her mouth. She knew she'd be in trouble if she was home, but she wasn't. Here she could do whatever she wanted. Including getting fat. Besides, she currently looked a little out of place since she was probably the thinnest person she'd seen here.

She continued shoveling the food into her mouth long after she'd reached the point of being full. At this point it was just her spite for the rest of her family that kept her going as she got a third tray. Finally, she leaned back on the bench looking at the empty tray in front of her, then down to her swollen middle. Smiling she began massaging her chubby belly. At this rate she would really start packing on the pounds. Besides, she needed to stretch her belly is she was going to have to sample a lot of food for her job. Might as well get a head start on that.

Slowly, she got up from the table, letting out a little belch as she slowly started waddling towards the exit. Each step was deliberate as she struggled to keep all the food she'd just eaten down. Carefully, she pushed the doors open and stepped onto the factory floor, tugging at her tight shirt as she began making her way towards her bedroom. The smell of sweets and baked goods made her stomach turn as she contemplated whether she could fit anymore food in her belly.

She shook her head as she glanced at one of the conveyors loaded with cookies. Her footsteps echoed around her in the wide open factory as she made her way towards the hallway that led to the living quarters. She was surprised that she didn't see anyone else on her short journey, but she was glad since she was struggling to keep her shirt around her swollen belly. Her clothes had already been getting small before she came here, and if she kept this up they weren't going to last very long. Though it wasn't like this was completely unanticipated.

Closing the door behind her, she made her way into the large bedroom. The floor was covered in a soft cherry-colored carpet, and the walls looked like they belonged in an ice-cream shop. There was a large king-sized bed in the middle of the room facing a large television meaning she wouldn't get bored in her down time. The room was lit by a couple of lamps on the bedside tables, and some sunlight streaming in through the glass ceiling above the pool. She made her way towards the window, looking at the scene below.

It almost looked like she was looking out of a resort window, than something in the middle of a factory. The pool was surrounded with cobblestone, and the walls around it were filled with windows. On top of that it looked like there were quite a few people enjoying the pool below. Some of them looked more like tourists than workers. Maybe she would have to ask Sam about that later, but now she wanted a nap.

She plopped down on the soft bed, and was asleep almost as soon as she closed her eyes. She wasn't sure how long she was asleep, but it was dark outside when she finally opened her eyes. She wasn't sure what had woken her at first, but she quickly realized just how hungry she was. She was starving. Still, maybe she should show at least a little restraint and wait until morning. Though, her belly looked like it had digested all the food since it wasn't quite so bloated now. Though it was odd since her clothes felt a bit tighter than they had earlier. She could always go to the cafeteria and get some food or just wait until morning.
12123.title: Pre-Work Stretches

choices: Grab some more tacos, who cares if she looks pregnant
Get dessert on the factory line
121231.content:
Stretching, Mel J made her way to the edge of the bed and swung her legs over the side. She couldn't place it, but something about herself felt different. Before she could really focus on it though, her stomach let out another loud growl prompting her out of bed. Her feet hit the soft floor as she made her way towards the door where she slipped her shoes back on. With a soft click, she opened the door to the hallway as the sweet smell of snacks wafted from the direction of the factory, prompting another growl form her belly.

She crept down the dimly lit hallway, her footsteps the only sound as she made her way towards the doors to the factory floor. She couldn't believe how hungry she was, it was as if she hadn't eaten in days. She bit her lip as she came to a sudden stop. Could she have slept for a couple of days? Could anyone sleep that long?

No, she was sure that someone would have waken her if she had tried to sleep through her shift. There's no way that uncle Sam would have let her sleep all day when she was supposed to be working. No, she was probably just hungry from stretching out her belly so much.

Letting out a sigh, she resumed her journey towards the cafeteria. She tried to ignore the smell of the delicious sweets as she made her way through the factory, past the few people who were forced to work overnight. In the end she grabbed a couple of cookies to tie her over until she could get her food at the cafeteria.

She pushed her way through the swinging doors into the cafeteria and looked at the couple of people who were enjoying some food on their breaks or after their shifts. There weren't nearly as many servers as there had been earlier, but there also weren't as many people getting food. Mel walked quickly across the tile floor towards the serving line, and grabbed a tray.

One of the obese woman placed several large tacos onto her plate as Mel's mouth began watering in anticipation of the delicious smelling food. She had always had a weak spot for Mexican food, and there was no way she wasn't going to load up on tacos. She quickly devoured the food on her plate and returned for seconds. Then thirds. Then fourths.

Finally, she leaned back on the bench, looking down at her round belly. She almost looked pregnant with how stuffed she was. She was sure that she'd eaten more than she had at lunch. Or dinner. Or whatever meal the turkey had been. Though she didn't feel nearly as stuffed as she had then. Maybe there was something in the food that was influencing her. Or maybe it was just how much she loved tacos. Either way, she was sure that she could get a few more down if she wanted to, though from how stuffed she looked, that might not be a good idea. Still, there was also the option of grabbing some 'dessert' from the factory floor before returning to bed. After all, that probably wouldn't be as filling. Though maybe she should show a little restraint and just return to bed. She did need to get up early for work in the morning.
121231.title: Midnight Snack

choices: Skip breakfast and get to work
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day
Just grab something from the cafeteria and bring it with her to work
1212311.content:
Mel J grabbed her tray and made her way back to the serving line, feeling her belly starting to weigh her down with its weight. She could feel it swaying side-to-side with each step she took as she focused on trying not to fall over under its weight. Her skin looked taut and red as she struggled to get her shirt around her small orb of a belly. She gave up after a few tries, letting her belly hang out slightly.

The server just smiled as she loaded up Mel's tray with more tacos. Returning to her seat, Mel devoured the tray before returning for even more. All the while the lady just smiled at her as she continued stuffing herself fuller and fuller. Her skin felt like it was going to rip with how tight her belly was getting as she returned for tray after tray of food. She couldn't stop. She didn't know what came over her, but she just kept eating. Even when it felt like she would explode if she took another bite, she found herself unable to stop.

She was finally brought back to her senses as she felt something bump into her belly, causing her to wince. She glanced to see what had managed to bump into her, and found her eyes going wide. Her belly was enormous. The thing that had bumped into her had been the table, now that her belly was able to reach all the way to it from the bench. She gently put a hand on her stomach, gasping at how sensitive it was.

The warmth felt good on her belly as she ran her hands over the overinflated skin. She'd never eaten so much food before in her life, but she was sure she would have kept going if her belly hadn't woken her from her stupor. Though now that she was out of her trance, she was very aware of how uncomfortable she was. She was surprised she hadn't vomited all the food up with how full she felt. Or that she had even been able to force more food down.

She gave a heartless tug on her pink shirt, knowing full well there was no way she could conceal the massive belly she was sporting. She looked almost nine months pregnant. Except instead of a baby, her belly was full of food. She chuckled despite her embarrassment. This must be what they mean when they say a food baby.

Mel J took a deep breath, wincing as her skin strained tighter. There was no way this was normal. Even for someone like her. Still... It wasn't like she was unhappy with the results. She had decided she was going to get fatter, and this would probably give her a good start. She'd have to see if the bathroom had a scale that she could weigh herself with after she digested all this food.

Her breaths came in short bursts as she pulled herself to her feet, her back straining as it struggled to support her protruding belly. She lifted her tray, using her belly to help support it as she walked it over to the return before exiting the cafeteria. Instantly the nauseating smell of sweets hit her nose as she let the doors swing shut behind her. She didn't even want to think about food right now.

She did her best to avoid looking at the conveyors filled with food all around her as she made her way slowly to her room. Each step was deliberate and calculated as her belly threatened to pull her over if she let her guard down for even a moment. Still, she finally made it to her room where she kicked off her shoes, and crawled into bed without even bothering to change into her pajamas.

She was awaken by the sound of a light rapping coming from her bedroom door, "Your uncle wanted me to make sure that you remembered your shift today since he hadn't seen you yet this morning."

"Alright. Thanks." Mel replied groggily, "Come in."

She glanced at the door as it swung open with hardly a sound revealing the plump secretary that she'd met the day before, "Were you still asleep? Your shift starts in just 10 minutes!"

Mel bolted upright, felling a strange weight trying to drag her back into the bed as she turned to give her full attention to the secretary, "Ten minutes! Crap!"

Mel j jumped out of bed, as she rushed towards her closet and threw it open. She began rifling through the clothes that she brought as the secretary began telling her of the different responsibilities she had as a Food Taster. She grabbed one of her favorite tank-tops and threw the blue shirt over her head and down around her chubby middle. It felt unusually tight on her, but she didn't have time to dwell on it as she grabbed a cute pair of jeans and threw them on as well. She winced as she struggled to get the button done up around her soft belly. She was sure this had been one of her bigger pairs, but maybe she was mistaken. Still, she didn't have time to look for another pair if she intended to get to work on time.

The secretary finally finished filling in Mel of all her responsibilities and excused herself from the room as Mel rushed to finish getting ready. She had quite the list of foods that her uncle wanted her to sample today. However, as she finished getting ready she became aware of just how hungry she was. She hadn't had time to get breakfast, but she was about to go eat a bunch of snacks. Still, maybe she should at least get some semi-healthy food first. She was sure her uncle wouldn't be too mad as long as she got to all the things on her list. Besides, she might not have room for all of the snacks she was supposed to sample if she filled up on other food like she had the night before.
1212311.title: Food Baby

choices: Do a thorough job sampling her list
12123112.content:
Mel J couldn't ignore the pain in her stomach as it growled in protest. She was so hungry that she probably should have breakfast first. Especially if she didn't want to feel sick later from only eating sweets. Still, she couldn't help feeling like something was different about herself as she moved in front of the stand mirror in the room.

She was used to her face being a bit chubby, but it almost seemed a little rounder than it had the day before. On top of that, her shirt seemed to hug her curves tighter than she was used to as it seemed to accent her chubby frame. Even her pants looked a bit tighter on her thighs as she lamented how tight the waist felt. If anything her clothes might be the limiting factor in how much she could eat today.

She shook her head and rushed down towards the cafeteria in the hopes of getting at least a small meal before she started her shift. As she pushed the doors open to the factory floor, she found it bustling with workers packaging the sweets and making sure that everything was running smoothly. She grabbed a couple cookies as she rushed onward, shoving them into her mouth out of instinct.

She was sure that her body was jiggling a bit more than it had the day before, but that was probably because she was in a hurry. She was speed walking, almost to the point of jogging, but she needed to eat quickly. She was panting as she pushed open the double doors to the cafeteria and made her way to the server.

She licked her lips as the smell of breakfast hit her nose, and she found herself almost drooling. She asked the obese lady serving food for an extra large portion since she'd probably only have time for one tray. The lady smiled and ladled several heavy scoops of eggs onto the tray, followed by almost a pound of bacon. With a quick "thank you", Mel J made her way to an unoccupied seat and began shoveling the food into her mouth.

She found herself glancing repeatedly at the clock above the door, watching as the hour hand hit nine. She was going to be a couple minutes late, but that couldn't be helped. She would just have to make sure to really do a good job and get to everything that she was supposed to do.

Her belly was noticeably swollen as she stood up, tugging on her skin-tight shirt and wincing as her jeans dug deeper into her waist. Rolling her eyes, she undid the button on her jeans, glancing around to see if anyone noticed. They still felt tight, though it wasn't as painful as it had been.

She dropped off her tray and made her way onto the factory floor, glancing at the list of items she needed to sample. It was a pretty large list, though it wasn't all-inclusive to everything in the factory. She smiled as an idea hit her. Maybe she should try to sample at least some of everything in the factory. That would definitely make up for her being a bit late to her shift, though it would also accelerate her growth considerably. The other option was to do a very thorough job sampling the items on the list so that she could provide great feedback. Finally, she could do the bare minimum. That way her uncle couldn't get mad at her for not getting her work done, and she wouldn't have to worry about growing as quickly.
12123112.title: Hearty Breakfast

choices: Agree and get a meal with her uncle
121231121.content:
Mel J glanced down at her swollen middle as she stood on the hard concrete floor of the factory. Sounds of machinery filled the air, almost drowning out her thoughts as she took her belly in her hands. At first it felt rather soft, but as she noticed how firm it felt under the thin layer of fat on her body.

She smiled, feeling how tight her stomach felt under her fat. Her mother would literally have a cow if she knew how much food Mel J had been eating. Especially since she'd only been here about a day. Then her dad would lecture her on how she needed to watch what she ate or she would get fat, and she'd say she didn't really care, and then he'd tell her that she would regret it if she didn't start caring. Yet here, there was no one telling her she needed to go on a diet. Or making remarks about how small her clothes were getting. Or trying to convince her to change. Here, she was just able to be herself. And if she happened to get fat... There wasn't anything her family could do about it.

She nodded to herself, a look of determination on her face as she strode over towards one of the conveyor belts, and grabbed a handful of goodies. She shoved one into her mouth, savoring the sweet flavor that rushed over her tongue as she began walking towards the next conveyor belt. She used her other hand to grab some of these sweets before making her way deeper into the factory.

Machinery whirled and hummed all around her as she moved from belt to belt, loading up on snacks. The sweet smell of baked goods filled the air as she walked past other employees packaging or sorting the goodies. It seemed like no matter how much she ate she wasn't getting any fuller, though her clothes were definitely struggling as she continued to swell up. Still, she couldn't resist how good everything tasted. However, there was something bugging her as she moved onto a conveyor covered in cupcakes. It was something that she'd first noticed the day before, but as she wandered through the factory it was really apparent.

She hadn't seen a single thin employee. Everyone that she had seen had definitely been fat, if not obese. She glanced at a group of employees at the next belt over. They were all enormous. On top of that, she noticed that they all seemed to be indulging themselves in the sweets. Though, it was definitely hard to resist them. Still, why did her uncle need a taste tester if he let the employees sample the goods? Although it was possible that they weren't supposed to and they were just sneaking the treats...

She shrugged to herself, shoving a cupcake into her waiting mouth as she grabbed a couple more from the belt before moving on. She chuckled as she licked some frosting from her fingers, shoving another cupcake into her mouth. If she kept this up it probably wouldn't be long before she fit right in with the rest of the employees. Though she would definitely need some new clothes if she got much bigger, she thought as she tugged at her shirt, struggling to get it to fully cover her rounding belly. On top of that, the zipper on her pants seemed to be slowly lowering itself as her growing belly pushed against it.

Still, it was hard to imagine that she'd get too fat in the month that she was here. Though she did want to at least put on some weight, just to see her parents reaction to their fat daughter. She wouldn't really say she was fat yet. Chubby. Definitely. Not fat. Though she planned on changing that. Still, she didn't really know that she wanted to get as big as some of the employees here that looked like they were barely mobile.

She sighed, moving onto the next conveyor and grabbing an armful of snacks. She really should pick up the pace if she planned on sampling everything by the time her shift was over.

The rest of her shift seemed to pass without too much incident as she stuffed herself with a bit of everything in the factory. She was so busy eating snacks that she didn't even realize her shift was over until her uncle came up to her, beaming as he watched her shoveling food into her mouth.

"So, how was your first day?"

"It was delicious. I mean good." she said through a mouthful of cake.

"Well, it definitely looks like you did a good job. I hope you can keep up that pace for the rest of the month."

"No problem"

"That's good to hear. Now how about joining me for a meal at the cafeteria? I think you've earned it after the hard work you've done today."

Mel J glanced at her swollen belly poking out of her shirt. The skin looked tight and red, and she almost thought she could see some stretchmarks forming on her waist. Still, it wasn't really like she was full. Which was weird. She'd never been able to eat this much food before coming to the factory. Though, it also wasn't like she'd really had the chance to eat this much food around her family. Though, maybe she should wait awhile before eating so she didn't look like a beached whale
121231121.title: Above and Beyond

choices: Say you just want to sleep
Ask your uncle some other questions before he leaves
1212311211.content:
"Sounds good." Mel J said, striding beside her uncle as the two of them began making their way towards the cafeteria.

"So, I noticed that you started a little late this morning."

"Yeah, I didn't sleep very well last night, so I might've slept in a little too long."

"Well, I think you more than made up for it today with how hard you were working. I was watching you, and I think you managed to sample everything in the factory."

"Yep."

"I'm rather impressed. You're taking to this job like a duck to water. Just make sure to keep up the good work."

"Will do."

They continued walking in relative silence, with the only sounds being from the factory machinery. Mel J glanced at her uncle, who seemed to be looking at her protruding belly, though he quickly glanced away when he noticed Mel J watching him. She felt her face go red as adverted her eyes to the ground, watching where she was stepping. Though, she was surprised at how much of the floor her belly was blocking from her view. If she didn't know better, she'd say she looked almost 8 months pregnant.

She couldn't blame uncle Sam for being surprised at how big her belly was, as it swayed side-to-side. She shivered as the cool air of the factory caressed her exposed belly, causing goosebumps to form on her arms. Just in one day she went from looking slightly chubby, to looking pregnant. Still, Sam seemed to be taking it pretty casually besides staring at her belly anytime he thought she wasn't looking.

Finally, the door to the cafeteria came into view as Sam held the door open for her. He followed her to the serving line where they both grabbed a tray.

"Trudy, make sure to give this hard worker an extra large portion. I think she's earned it." Sam said, placing a hand on Mel J's shoulder.

Mel J felt her face burning as she offered the tray to Trudy, doing her best to avert her gaze. She'd never really been self conscious of her weight before, but there was something about her uncle that seemed to make her realize just how big she must look. Still, she couldn't refuse. Not that she wanted to. Despite how much she'd eaten that day she was still starving.

She found an empty table for her and Sam and set her tray down. She struggled to get her legs over the bench to sit down as her large belly seemed to prevent her from raising them very high. Still, she eventually managed to sit down and begin eating the massive feast.

"Just let me know if you want me to grab you another tray." Sam said, sitting down across from the large-bellied teen.

"Alright." Mel J said through a mouthful of food.

The two of them ate in silence, though that was mostly because Mel J's mouth was constantly full of food except for when she had her uncle grab her another tray. Then another. And another. She didn't know what came over her, but she just couldn't seem to stop eating. It was like it wasn't even her choice anymore as she felt her belly growing over her lap. Yet Sam never said anything as he continued bringing her tray after tray full of food.

Finally, she managed to get the strength to call it quits as she slouched back on the bench, feeling her belly resting heavily on her lap and pressing into the table. She tried to turn to get off the bench, but found her weight practically pinning her in place as she panted heavily with her stuffed belly. There was no mistaking the stretchmarks crisscrossing her belly now as she tried again to lift herself.

She panted, feeling sweat beading on her brow from the exertion of trying to lift her heavy belly. She looked like she was 9 month pregnant with quadruplets at this point. Though there wasn't anything she could do about it now. Still, she was surprised that no one else seemed to be paying her any mind as Sam came around to help her up.

With some work, they both managed to get her into a standing position, though it was another thing entirely to stay standing. Her belly felt like it weighed a ton as her legs shook under its weight. On top of that, she couldn't even begin to keep her back straight as her belly pulled on her awkwardly. Still, between the two of them they slowly began maneuvering her belly back to her room.

It took almost an hour, but eventually she was laid down in bed. She glanced down at her body and frowned. She looked practically naked with how small her clothes were on her large belly. Still, at least the important parts were covered.

"Did you want anything else to eat before bed?" Sam asked, placing a warm hand on Mel J's swollen belly.

She was already so stuffed and large, that there was no way she wouldn't put on weight from this. Besides, if she kept this up she might be too fat to leave by the end of the month. Still, she couldn't deny that her belly wanted more food. And at this point it wasn't like she was going to notice the difference between 20 and 30 pounds of fat.
1212311211.title: Quality bonding time

12123112112.content:
"Actually, I think I'm just going to get some sleep. I'm pretty tired."

Sam glanced at the floor, and Mel was sure she saw a look of disappointment on his face for a brief moment, but it was instantly gone when he looked back at her smiling, "I understand. I'll talk to you tomorrow, OK?"

"Yep. Goodnight."

Mel J watched her uncle leave, shutting the door behind him with a soft click. Despite the distance from the factory floor, she caught a wiff of the sweets wafting in before the door shut. Her stomach let out a soft growl as she thought about how good all the food was here.

Mel J closed her eyes, laying back on her bed as her hands massaged her swollen middle. She had never eaten so much food before in her life. If she kept this up, there was no way that she'd be able to leave at the end of the month. She might not even be able to leave by the end of the week.

She opened her eyes and glanced at her belly rising above her as she continued to massage the tight orb. Her shirt was bunched up above her belly, unable to stretch around the massive globe of flesh and food which left her belly on display for the world to see. She couldn't see them past her belly, but she was glad that she'd been able to get into her pajamas since her jeans had been feeling so tight. And that was even with them undone.

She sighed as she closed her eyes again. She couldn't believe how much she'd eaten. It was like she was a slave to her hunger. On top of that she had to admit that she was still hungry, which was crazy. Still, it wasn't like she wanted to get stuck here so she might want to show a little bit more restraint. She was sure she'd already put on enough weight to spite her family and it was just the second day.

She wasn't sure when she actually fell asleep, but she was woken by the sound of her alarm clock going off. Not opening her eyes, she reached towards where she knew it would be and turned it off after a few tries. She had some of the weirdest dreams about eating and getting fat. In her dream she'd been immobile and Sam had just kept feeding her and feeding her as she got so big she couldn't fit in the factory any more. It had felt so real at the time. Though the weird thing was how much she'd enjoyed it.

She tugged at her shirt which felt unusually tight as it clung to her skin. Her pajama bottoms also felt relatively tight on her legs as she stretched in her bed. She opened her eyes, squinting in the morning light as she glanced down at her body.

Her heart skipped a beat as she took in what she could see of her body. She couldn't believe her eyes. She knew she was going to put on weight after her feast the night before, but she'd never expected this.

Her shirt was stretched tight on her plump middle, though it looked like her belly wasn't the only thing that had grown. Her breasts looked at least a couple cup-sizes bigger as her shirt hugged to them. Her belly wasn't nearly as round as it had been the night before, but that was because it had turned into a nice soft layer of fat. She could feel the elastic waist of her bottoms cutting into her soft flesh.

She struggled out of bed, the weight of her body fighting her every move as she got to her feet. She didn't even have to look to know that she'd put on a lot of weight judging by how heavy and sluggish her body felt as she jiggled to the bathroom. She got on the scale, trying to peer past her belly at the numbers.

214

She felt a fluttering in her belly. She couldn't believe it. She'd put on almost 50 pounds in just a couple of days. At this rate she really wouldn't last a week without becoming immobile. Already she was starting to notice the weight slowing her down, and that was just after one day of work. She may have gone a little overboard, though she was having the hardest time resisting the food here. If she kept this up she was going to need to get new clothes before the day was over. Maybe she could go shopping after work...

Mel J stood staring at herself in the mirror for a few more minutes. Occasionally she would turn to look at her fat body from another angle, but she was captivated with her softer frame. Her clothes clung to her skin, seeming to accent every curve and roll of her fatty body.

She cocked her head to the side and smiled a little. Honestly she really didn't look that bad. She was probably just overreacting a little since she had gained so quickly. She knew there were other girls at her school who were definitely fatter than her. Besides, she actually kind of liked the way that her curves accentuated her feminine features. Still, she should probably try to show a little bit of self restraint unless she wanted to be a whale by the end of the week.

Mel J eventually pulled herself away from the mirror and got ready for work. She wasn't able to find any clothes that didn't look several sizes too small on her, so she finally just admitted to herself that she was going to have to look like a fat cow for the day. At least until she could go clothes shopping that evening. She did one last twirl in the mirror, admiring her fat body before making her way out of her room.

Her stomach let out a growl as the sweet smell of the goodies from the factory floor hit her nose as the door clicked shut behind her. She began making her way towards the cafeteria for breakfast, her footfalls sounding louder than normal as she walked down the hallway. Her mouth was watering as she thought about how good all the sweets were going to taste, and she found herself licking her lips in anticipation.

The sound of machinery grew louder as she neared the end of the hall, and the smell of sweets grew stronger until she finally emerged onto the factory floor. The machinery continued its endless job of delivering tasty snacks to the groups of workers in charge of packaging the goodies, filling the air with a rumbling thunder that was occasionally punctuated with the sound of clanging or ringing.

She continued through the labyrinth of machines towards the cafeteria, occasionally grabbing a snack off of one of the conveyors as she passed by. No one really seemed to pay her much mind as she strode by, occasionally tugging at her tight shirt to try to get it to fit better. She still was fairly thin compared to most of the other employees though so it wasn't like she was too concerned about them judging her. Besides, it wasn't like she was the only one who didn't seem to fit into their clothes. There actually seemed to be quite a few people with ill-fitting attire.

Mel J was almost to the cafeteria when she heard someone call her name. She spun around looking for the source, and smiled as she spotted her uncle rushing towards her.

"There you are. I tried to catch you in your room, but you'd already left." He said, panting a little from his short sprint as he smiled at her, "If you want I've got a very special job for you, though you don't have to take it if you don't want to."

"What is it?"

"Well, we've got a bunch of product in the warehouse that is close to expiration, so I can't sell it and I don't want it to go to waste, so I was hopping that you'd eat it for me." Sam said, looking Mel J up and down with a slight smile.

Mel J glanced down at her slightly exposed belly, "Well I was hoping to go clothes shopping today...."

"I'll tell you what. Do this for me and you can leave work early tomorrow."

It was a tempting offer, though who knew how much food she'd have to eat today. She might find herself stuffed so much she wouldn't be able to lift her belly. Though it would give her a chance to go clothes shopping tomorrow for sure. Though she wasn't sure her clothes would last that long.
12123112112.title: Call It Quits for the Night

121231121121.content:
Mel J chewed on her lip, glancing down at her slightly protruding belly. She could feel the cool factory air on her exposed midriff, though from this perspective she couldn't see her exposed skin yet. Her uncle was beaming at her as he waited for a response.

Mel J was sure that there would be a ton of food for her to eat, which would definitely add to her already expanded waistline. Though, if she did this now and bought clothes tomorrow, she wouldn't have to worry about outgrowing her new clothes immediately after. Still, there was no guarantee that wouldn't happen anyway with how much food she was eating here.

"Alright. I'll do it." Mel J finally said.

Sam's smile seemed to grow even bigger as he put an arm around her chubby shoulders, "That's great to hear! I knew I could count on you! Let me show you the product I want you to eat today!"

Mel J stumbled slightly as Sam began leading her through the factory at a quick pace, keeping his arm around her shoulder the whole time. Despite having only been here a couple of days, she was already starting to recognize some of the other employees that worked at the factory and several of them waved at her cheerily. It didn't take long though for her uncle to lead her into a part of the factory that she didn't recognize.

Many of the machines here seemed different and it was a lot quieter in this part of the factory. She glanced at the many conveyor belts and noticed that most of them contained packages of snacks now, which meant they were probably nearing the end of the packaging line.

Mel J was finding herself panting slightly from trying to keep up with her uncle's quick pace. It didn't help that she had close to 50 extra pounds on her body slowing her down as well. She still couldn't believe how quickly she'd put on weight since she'd come here. She had wanted to get fat, but she hadn't figured that it would happen this quickly.

Finally Uncle Sam stopped lead Mel J through a pair of swinging doors into a large warehouse filled with packages and packages of sweets. Most of the packages were packed onto pallets sitting on large shelves, waiting to be loaded onto trucks for delivery. She could hear a fork lift down one of the aisles of goodies in the otherwise quiet warehouse. Near the back she could see several workers with pallet jacks loading up several trucks.

Uncle Sam lead her down several twists and turns before stopping in front of a pallet of goodies that had been unwrapped and were sitting on the floor, "Alright, see this pallet?"

"Yeah."

"I want you to eat all of these for me today since they expire in a couple of days."

"All by myself?"

"Yep, do you think you can handle that?"

Mel J took a deep breath, " Yeah. I think so."

"Don't worry too much. If you don't finish, you can finish the rest tomorrow, in addition to your normal duties."

"Alright."

"If you need anything, I'll be in my office."

With that Mel J's uncle turned and strode back the way they'd came, leaving her alone with a large pallet of cookies to eat. When he said that he had some things for her to eat, she hadn't imagined he meant a whole pallet of food. She had figured it would be a couple of boxes at most. Still, it wasn't like she could change her mind now, though this really was going to affect her waistline.

She glanced around at the shelves towering over her heavy with pallets of food. It was weird to be so alone in this factory. Well, she knew she wasn't alone, but she was. There were workers loading the trucks and working forklifts, but none of them were within view of her which made her feel alone.

Taking one last glance at her chubby body, she resigned herself to eating. She ripped open the first box and began shoving the delicious cookies into her mouth. Once she started she lost herself in the amazing flavor and texture of the packaged cookies. Box after box disappeared from the pallet and joined a pile of empty boxes on the ground as she gorged herself on the delicious treats.

She could feel her belly growing heavy with food, as her shirt rode up further and further on her frame. Her pants were starting to cut into her waist painfully, but still she ate, driven by an almost primal desire for food. She didn't know how long it took, but finally she tossed the last package onto the pile of empty boxes. At some point she'd sat down to relieve the burden on her legs of trying to hold up her heavy belly.

She couldn't believe how big her belly was as it rested on the ground between her legs letting out slight gurgling noises as it worked to digest her enormous feast. Even with her legs mostly straight out in front of her, her belly still passed her knees with how stuffed it was with food. It honestly looked like she'd swallowed a giant beach ball. Or maybe two! There was no way she wasn't going to be fatter after all this food digested.

Mel J took a deep breath as she tried to stand, however, the weight of her belly was proving to be too much for her. Panicking slightly, she tried again, grunting in exertion as her belly kept her pinned to the floor. She glanced around the warehouse, hoping someone was nearby, but she couldn't even hear the forklift anymore.

She could feel herself panicking more and more as she struggled with her heavy belly. She'd wanted to get fatter, but this wasn't what she'd planned on. She hadn't planned on being immobile on her second day! What was she going to do? She didn't want to be stuck here forever!

She took a deep breath, trying to calm herself down and think things through. She knew she couldn't lift her belly by herself, but maybe someone would come help her if she called for help. However, she really didn't want to try to explain her situation to some random stranger.

Well, she couldn't lift her belly, but maybe she could drag it. It wasn't like her belly was immovable, just really heavy. So while she couldn't lift it, she might be able to drag in along the cement floor. Though that probably wouldn't be very comfortable on her exposed skin, and she still didn't want anyone seeing her like this.

She leaned back and sighed, the other option was just to rest here overnight and hope that no one stumbled on her. It wasn't ideal, but at least she'd probably be able to move in the morning one her body had digested all the food she'd eaten. Though she was definitely going to be fatter after this and who knew if her clothes would still cover her in the morning. She didn't want to be lying in the middle of a warehouse exposed to the world because her clothes were too small. Although, maybe her clothes wouldn't be that small on her and she wouldn't be indecent.
121231121121.title: Helping Hand

choices: Yes. Take her back to her room
1212311211211.content:
Mel J let out a loud call for help, hoping that someone would come. After a few moments, she let out another cry, then another. She was just about to give up, when a couple of people rounded the corner and started jogging towards her.

"What's going on?" Asked a particularly large boy, who seemed like he was maybe 18.

Mel J just looked at them pleadingly, "I'm stuck. I was supposed to eat this pallet of cookies, and well now I can't move my belly."

The two boys glanced at her very exposed belly then towards each other. The taller of the two smiled, "Sure we'll help you."

"You will!" Mel J couldn't keep the excitement from her voice.

"You're too big for us to move though, but maybe if you could get onto that pallet, we could use the pallet jack to take you back to your room."

Slowly, she pulled herself to her feet, feeling her tight belly keeping her bent over. She began backing up towards the pallet at a crawl, until she could finally sit down, hoisting her belly onto the pallet.

"Alright, I'll be right back with the jack, said the younger boy." He rushed off at a quick waddle, leaving her alone with the taller boy.

"Thank you so much for the help." She said, panting from her short trek onto the pallet.

The boy just smiled, nodding. They sat in silence until the other boy returned with the the jack. He nimbly maneuvered it into position, and lifted up the pallet. Within moments the three of them were on their way back into the factory passing the packaging area.

"Where are we going?" Mel asked as they walked past the entrance to her living quarters.

The younger boy smiled, "Don't worry, we're just taking a slight detour."

"But I don't want anyone else seeing me like this."

The two boys chuckled, "Oh don't worry, they won't. You'll be a lot bigger when they see you."

"Wait, what do you mean?' Mel asked, starting to panic.

"You'll see."

She stayed silent as they took her into a part of the factory she'd never been in before. The machines here were different, and seemed to be where they made all the treats. However, they soon arrived in front of a large vat.

"This is the stuff that makes the treats so addicting. We were thinking you might be thirsty after all that food that you ate."

A moment later, they had taken a hose and forced it into her mouth. She almost gagged as fluid rushed into her mouth, and began flowing into her already taut belly. Still, it was delicious and she quickly found herself sucking at the fluid greedily. She hardly cared that her belly was swelling rapidly as the fluid filled it up. The more she drank, the more she found herself wanting to drink. It was truly addicting.

She felt something cold touch her belly, and glance around the hose. She almost gasped as she realized that her belly was starting to sag over the edge of the pallet onto the floor. Her shirt was nothing more that a glorified bra at this point, and her pants had long since ripped, leaving her in her underwear. She wanted them to stop, but her own weight was stopping her from resisting as they pumped more and more into her.

Finally, when she was sure that she was going to burst, they turned off the hose. A part of her was disappointed that it had stopped, but she knew she was going to be significantly fatter after this. Still, she wanted more. She was craving more.

"Are you done, piggy?" the young boy asked.
1212311211211.title: Making matters worse

12123112112111.content:
Mel J was breathing heavy, trying to ignore the intense pressure in her belly. She couldn't believe how big and round it was now. And yet, a part of her wanted to keep going. To give in and see how big she could get. But not now. Not yet. She had wanted to gain weight, but this was far more than she'd planned on.

She tried to speak, but she couldn't form words through her panting. Dejectedly, she resigned herself to a simple nod as she rubbed her tightly stretched skin on her belly. The two boys chuckled as they began working together to move the heavier load.

"You'll look a lot better in the morning." the younger one said, glancing over his shoulder, "You were way too skinny to be working here."

She said nothing. She couldn't if she wanted to. Her massive belly was weighing her down, pressing on her lungs. She couldn't seem to take her eyes off the sheer size of her own stomach. She had no idea she could eat this much, though it was probably something in the liquid they'd given her. She couldn't deny that she wanted more. She was craving it. But it wasn't time yet.

The trip passed in a blur, and she hardly remembered the boys working together to lift her into her bed as she drifted off to a dream-filled sleep, slowly rubbing her massive belly. She dreamed of food and getting fatter. She was happy as she grew larger and larger, and she didn't care when she was too fat to move. She grew massive, far outstripping everyone in the factory, as she was fed and fed and fed.

Finally she awoke, feeling a huge weight on top of her. She blinked a few times before she glanced down to see what was on her.

She gasped, almost screaming as she caught sight of what it was. It was her. She was the weight. Her body was thick and flabby, far beyond what she'd anticipated. Her underwear was cutting painfully into her waist, though she couldn't see it under her massive belly. Her shirt was acting as a bra around her ample bosom. Her arms and legs had more than doubled in thickness as well.

Huffing and puffing, she heaved herself out of bed and rushed to the bathroom jumping on the scale. She watched the numbers shoot up around her belly, finally resting on...
12123112112111.title: Satisfied

choices: Mel J starts having a dream
Mel J wakes up in the middle of the night
Mel J wakes up the next day
1212313.content:
The food may have caused Mel J to get hungry even more, even smelling it as it was still making a lot of it all the time. But she knew at the same time that she needs to work so hard for Uncle Sam. So getting to bed sooner to get up nice and fresh, is the only possible way to avoid being late by any means.

“Y’know, I’m sure I can handle this fine, if I can get some sleep now, and deal with some food first thing in the morning.” Mel J has made a decisions and decides to stick it this way.

And so as she promised, it was time to call it a day, and headed back to her room to get some sleep. She knows it was the smartest thing to do, and needed to take it easy before starting with fresh minds for an early shift. Mel J could ignore the smells that caused to make a distraction, and simply walked through the hallway, up to the door she went.

She’s gotten herself changed into her pyjamas that looked a bit tighter like her clothes she wore before, and she takes a drink of soda to hydrate herself before climbing on the bed to get some sleep.

Mel J will be hoping tomorrow is the new start, and see if her new job would be worth it, if it means to get this full time, once she leaves school. Not only that, but she’ll had to wonder how fat she could get, even after her work placement here that it would take weeks until she’s done. Then she’ll have to tell her teacher on how it went, if she would surprise them with her size in all.

Uncle Sam now takes his neice to her bedroom that Mel J will be sleeping for the summer holidays while working. as Uncle Sam left her brand new luxury bedroom, Mel J looked around this place as she loved every minute of it and now she likes ro get it started by...

Once J reached the station, she noticed a hot dog stand. Given her appetite J couldn't refuse and purchased a nice high calorie treat. Plus the extra calories would only help an aspiring sumo vixen. As J began consuming the tantalizing substance, J noticed...
125211.title: Get to the train

13.content: What did Emma gains weight by...?
13.title: Emma

131.content:
It was early May, and Emma was barely a month away from middle school graduation. Before we continue, let me explain something. About three months ago Emma was 105 pounds, compared to her current 120. This is because three months, the school resourced its cafeteria to McDonalds. This provided extra income, but caused the students to gain weight. Emma is part of the cheerleading squad. Three months ago the cheerleading team all weighed between 100 and 110 pounds. Now, they'd each gained about 15 pounds, making them a bit chubbier. However, there was still a month of school left, and their gaining wasn't done just yet. In preparations for the state cheer competition, they had practice before and after school. The excersize was minimal, they simply learned techniques. After morning practice, they'd go as a team for a second breakfast before school in the cafeteria. Their coach also brought donuts to each morning practice, enough for three per cheerleader, and they were always finished. After the after schoool practice, the team would go out to pizza hut and then coldstone for dessert. Also, when they got home, each recieved a second dinner and dessert from their families. Obviously this caused increased weight gain, but more than anyone expected. Most of the cheerleaders gained 30 pounds by graduation, including Emma! The cheer squad picture for the yearbook showed the team flowing out of their skimpy cheer uniforms. This is why, at her 8th grade graduation, Emma (and her friends) were 150 pounds.

When summer started, Emma was a complete blob. She never exercised, unless you count walking to the refridgerator. Every moring her mom made her a huge breakfast. Wether it be fried eggs with bacon or homemade donuts it was always fattening. Emma's mom also kept the pantry fully stockewd with fatty foods, but with Emma constantly snacking on them, it wasn't easy to have a full cupboard. Emma's dinner was usually a 16" meatlovers pizza delivered with a side of breadsticks and two liter of (non-diet) coke. Her mom was an excellent cook, and every night made a different dessert. She baked full pies, cakes, and pans of bwonies, and Emma always devoured the whole thing, usually with the help of ice cream.

One night, Emma woke up unusually hungry. That day, she'd eaten even more than she normally did. Upon waking up, she found her mom had gotten a dozen donuts. She ate all of them, and even then she had room for 6 fried eggs, 10 links of sausage, and half a gallon of whole milk. She then stuffed herself with 5 bags of potato chips before lunch while watching T.V. At noon, she and her mom went to the mall. Lucina Takes Morgan to the Movies
1553322222222221.content:
Lucina awoke to the smell of fresh baked cookies.

"Morning Lucina" Lucina turned and saw her little brother Morgan on the bed. "Morning Morgan" She says before going back to her earlier position, eyes closed. They bolt open and she turns back again. "Morgan what are you doing in my bed?" Lucina asks, Morgan still smiling. "I made breakfast." He held up a plate of chocolate chip cookies.

Lucina sighed "Morgan, cookies aren't a proper breakfast." Morgan pouted, his sister sighing again "Fine, only because I can't resist that cute face of yours." She says before taking a cookie and eating it. Morgan eagerly watching as his sister started to eat more.

Eventually Lucina polished off the entire plate, Morgan leaving the room to eat his breakfast. Lucina getting dressed for the day.

What now?
1553322222222221.title: Lucina it is!

15533222222222212.content:
Now that she has finished her breakfast, Lucina has got a whole lot of idea to have a day out with his younger brother. There are so many places all around, though she would be planning to find something to eat along the way. Luckily, she didn’t take long to choose, and asked Morgan for a treat.

“Say Morgan! I know you’ve been making these all the time, but how about if we can go to the cinema and maybe get some treats over there?” Lucina wondered with that cheerful smile to her face.

“Sure! Let’s go!” Morgan seems to be so excited, and couldn’t wait to go and see the movie with his big, curvy sister.

So the two didn’t waste time and headed out to the car and drive over towards the cinema, which is pretty much not far away from their house. Once arriving there, the two had spotted a number of food stands presented, with some popcorn, fast food meals, and some shakes, which certainly looks so good by the quality of it.

Of course Morgan could even thought letting Lucina have lots of meal before going to the theater to watch, so he asked his sister if she wants to have a meal now, or just head to the cinema?

“Do you wanna have some food before we go in?” Morgan asked in a curious way.

“Of course I do! We should probably take some________ before we get in.”
15533222222222212.title: Lucina Takes Morgan to the Movies

155332222222222121.content:
Lucina went over to the stand and was about to order but before she could Morgan spoke up. "Can we have the largest bag of Popcorn with lots and lots of butter?" The cashier simply smiled "Sure thing little fella" He turned around and prepared the popcorn. He handed it to Lucina who gave the cashier money in return.

Lucina and Morgan got their seats and Lucina began munching on the popcorn before the movie even started. Thankfully the movie started soon afterwards.

While Lucina's attention was just on the movie, continuously stuffing popcorn in her mouth. Morgan's attention however was split between watching the movie and watching his sister eat. Lucina caught Morgan looking at her. She lifted the bag towards Morgan who just shook his head. Lucina shrugged and started eating popcorn again.

Once the movie was over Morgan and Lucina exited the theater, Lucina's stomach sticking out a tiny bit from eating an entire bag of popcorn.

"Lucina, can we get lunch?" Morgan asked with puppy eyes, Lucina was thinking for a bit. "Okay sure, what do you have in mind?"
